   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to windupbox's documentation!
=============================================

Welcome to the documentation of *windupbox* - a command line utility for easily creating custom and minimal Windows Vagrant Boxes.

The documentation provides in the section :doc:`usage/index` an a short walk through how to create a Windows Vagrant Box

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage/index
   cli/index
